text: Cac nguoi hay o trong nha cua minh va cho pho truong ve đep theo loi chung dien (cua nhung phu nu) Jahiliyah (thoi ngu muoi tien Islam); cac nguoi hay chu đao duy tri le nguyen Salah, hay xuat Zakah, hay vang lenh Allah va Thien Su cua Ngai. Hoi nguoi nha cua (Thien Su), Allah that ra chi muon xoa nhung thu o ue khoi cac nguoi cung nhu Ngai chi muon tay sach cac nguoi thanh nhung nguoi hoan toan thanh khiet
